sep_scene.content: The image captures a scene from the movie "The Old Guard" featuring a group of people and a large dragon-like creature. The people, dressed in blue robes, are walking towards the camera, their path leading them towards a large dragon-like creature. The creature, with its long neck and sharp teeth, is standing on a rocky hillside. The backdrop of the scene is a desert landscape with a clear blue sky. The image is a vivid portrayal of the movie's setting, with the people and the dragon-like creature as the main focus.

The image captures a scene from the movie "The Old Guard" featuring actors. The central figure is a man in a blue robe, holding a spear and a shield, standing in front of two other men. The man in the blue robe is positioned in the middle, with the two other men on either side of him. The background is a rocky landscape under a clear blue sky. The image is a close-up shot, focusing on the figures and their attire.

In this image, we see a scene from the movie "The Old Guard" featuring actors Paul Rudd, KiKi Layne, and Chris Tucker. The central figure is a man in a red robe, holding a staff and standing in front of a group of people. The man's face is etched with a serious expression, suggesting a moment of intense action or decision-making. Behind him, two women are seen, one of whom is holding a shield, possibly indicating a defensive stance or a protective role. The backdrop is a rocky landscape with a dragon-like creature in the distance, adding to the dramatic atmosphere of the scene.

The image captures a scene from the movie "The Old Guard" featuring actors KiKi Layne and Chris Tucker. KiKi Layne, portraying the character of the blue turbaned man, stands in the foreground. He is holding a spear and a shield, ready for battle. Behind him, Chris Tucker, playing the character of the man in the blue turban, is seen in the background. He is holding a spear and a shield, mirroring Layne's stance. The backdrop of the image is a desert landscape, adding to the intensity of the scene.

In the image, we see a scene from the movie "The Old Guard" featuring actors Jason Statham and Chris Tucker. Jason Statham, portraying the character of the guard, is standing in the foreground. He is wearing a blue and gold armor, his face set in a determined expression. Behind him, Chris Tucker, playing the character of the guard, is seen. He is wearing a brown and gold armor, his face set in a concerned expression. The backdrop of the image is a rocky desert landscape, adding to the intensity of the scene.

The image captures a scene from the movie "The Dark Ages" featuring actor Jason Bateman. He is standing tall against a backdrop of a clear blue sky. Dressed in a black and silver armor, he exudes an air of confidence and strength. His face is adorned with tattoos, adding to his rugged appearance. His gaze is directed upwards, suggesting a sense of awe or admiration. The image is a close-up shot, focusing on Bateman's face and upper body, emphasizing his imposing presence.
